messages.title: Dear Voter,
messages.content: I have lived in South Croydon for more than 30 years. I have opposed our membership of what was originally the EEC since it was first promoted by the Conservative Party. The three years since 17.4 million people voted to leave the EU have revealed the duplicity and dishonesty of those we voted to represent us in Parliament. In 2017, all major manifestos promised to honour the referendum result, yet MPs have done all they can to hinder our departure. The so-called deal is a form of vassalage to the EU for years to come, designed to ensure our return to the fold. We need politicians who truly represent their electorate. Sovereignty belongs to the people, Parliament should have no power to take it from us. I intend to ensure we honour the nation's democratic vote and implement the common-sense policies of the UKIP manifesto. Kathleen

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure the UK leaves the EU without any ongoing ties.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put our NHS before Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritize NHS funding over foreign aid.
Eliminate the mandatory BBC licence fee.
Prohibit the slaughtering of animals without stunning them first.
Protect traditional British values and free speech rights.

mentions.tacticalSituation: 17.4 million people voted to leave the EU

issues.brexitEurope: Deliver a Clean-Break Brexit; The so-called deal is a form of vassalage to the EU for years to come, designed to ensure our return to the fold.
issues.government: Sack Liar Politicians; We need politicians who truly represent their electorate.
issues.health: Put our NHS before Foreign Aid
